template.name: Traveloka V3 Presenter
template.description: Creates a new Presenter that automatically generated needed component.

parameter.name: Presenter Class Name
parameter.help: By convention, it will automatically add 'Presenter' as suffix

parameter.name: Extract Interface?
parameter.help: If checked, presenter can be referenced as implementation

parameter.name: Interface Name
parameter.help: Interface name, or as known as contract in previous architecture

parameter.name: Interface method(s)
parameter.default: void doLogin(); String getLoggedUser(); boolean doLogOut()
parameter.help: Optional method, separate by ';' ex: void doLogin(); String getLoggedUser(); boolean doLogOut()

parameter.name: Base Presenter Class
parameter.help: Choose the parent presenter Class, can be BasePresenter or BaseToolbarPresenter
